error_fetch: Could not load weather data from WeatherUnderground.
interval_helper: Specifies weather data refresh interval in minutes
location_helper: Either 'Country/City', 'Latitude,Longitude', 'Airport code' or 'pws:WeatherundergoundPwsID' (see query section in http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/docs?d=data/index)
m_descr:
ATTENTION: wunderground Fetches detailed weather data from www.wunderground.com. Creates up to eight virtual devices for humidity, pressure, current conditions, wind, solar radiation and (high/low/condition) forecasts.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-WeatherUnderground for detailed documentation.
